channel.title: VPS help , need to install java etc
channel.description:
hi mopar, i have now a VPS but i dont know how to run my server on it. i follow VPS tutorials but they cant help, Tutorials only let me know how to connect. thats no problem for me. all files are on my vps. but idk how i need to run my server and install java on it. i use ssh login. can someone help me?
i have teamviewer if you want.
grts, Mr Tekkah
